attributes.action: stop Harriet Harman from introducing a law prohibiting pornographic material being displayed in workplaces
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This law Harriet Harman is trying to introduce is complete rubbish and totally feminist which is what she seems to be. Most workplaces, appart from those where customer interaction takes place, have a 'page 3' calender on the wall and they don't cause anyone any offense. And if they do they are taken down its common sense!
